title: Encore: The Trailblazer
description:
You’re a successful woman in a man’s business, and yet you’re not sure you can do it alone. You’ve worked so hard to get here, but now you’re afraid of losing everything. 

Hosted by Virginia Madsen. 

This episode originally aired in 2018. 

Listen to new episodes 1 week early and to all episodes ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App https://wondery.app.link/imaginedlife.

Support us by supporting our sponsors!
